answers.answer: Hello.You could be having symptoms of neuropathy. Please make sure you have done your blood work. Rule out Diabetes. Take an MRI of the lower back to rule out any pinched nerve due to any bulging disc.Most importantly, get a Neurologist's opinion.Regards

question: Intermentant paralisis; legs & feet numb; in past 2 months. Help please
title: Feet & Leg Numb
